value:
# Site Config Values
site.base=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kaelyx-dev/kaelyx.content/refs/heads/main/
# Config Service
config.remote.location=site.conf
config.persistence.forcerefresh=true
config.persistence.keyname=config
config.persistence.invalidate=86400
config.persistence.timestampkey=lastConfigRefresh

# Content Service
content.shortcodes.enabled=true
content.shortcodes.removeunknown=true
content.shortcodes.syntax.start={{
content.shortcodes.syntax.end=}}
content.shortcodes.placeholder=shortcode-placeholder

content.normalizelinks.enabled=true

content.timetoread.enabled=true
content.timetoread.wpm=200

content.permalink.querykey=q
content.permalink.encoding=BASE64

# Directory Service
directory.foldercharacter=/
directory.metacharacter=:
directory.directoryfile=directory
directory.base=/
directory.persistence.forcerefresh=true
directory.persistence.keyname=config
directory.persistence.invalidate=86400
directory.persistence.timestampkey=lastDirectoryRefresh
